rescuecore2.score

Class DelegatingScoreFunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • rescuecore2.score.AbstractScoreFunction
      • rescuecore2.score.DelegatingScoreFunction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ScoreFunction
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    InverseScoreFunction, ScoreGraph, ScoreTable, UnaryOperatorScoreFunction

    public abstract class DelegatingScoreFunction
extends AbstractScoreFunction
    A score function that applies some function to the score of a child score function.
